text: Q20. | [MSQ] Which of the following statements is/ are true? (A) A Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC) may be used in any situation where aChecksum may be used. (B) Cyclic Redundancy Check may detect single bit errors in a stream of bits with unknown length. (Â©) It is not possible for two files containing different bit patterns to have the same Cyclic RedundancyCheck value. (D) A Cyclic Redundancy Check encrypts file contents.
